column4: I'm told that when I install a Windows OS it will rewrite and remove GRUB. How can I back up my GRUB menu.lst and reinstall it after installation?
I'm told that when I install a Windows OS it will rewrite and remove GRUB. How can I back up my GRUB menu.lst and reinstall it after installation?
Is backing up menu.lst on GRUB enough to preserve it or is there more to it than that?
you don't need to back it up
